## OWebRouter.(constructor)

OWebRouter constructor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(baseUrl: string, hashMode: boolean | undefined, notFound: (target: ORouteTarget) => void);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  baseUrl | string | the base url |
|  hashMode | boolean \| undefined | weather to use hash mode |
|  notFound | (target: [ORouteTarget](./oweb.oroutetarget.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | called when a route is not found |
